data.name: Draginsanity
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to the magical realm Draginsanity. It is full of dragons! And it is totally insane! It used to be a world where dragons lived together in peace and harmony. But one day an evil wizard cast a spell that turned most of the dragons into evil minions. He also reduced the amount of mana in the air. The mana enabled the dragons to fly and spit fire. Without it the resistance against the wizard died quickly. All hope was lost until one day a dragon was gifted with the power to see the few remaining mana hotspots in the air and use them to his advantage.

Draginsanity is a nostalgic 2D platformer and it's easy to play. No matter which button you press: If the hero dragon is surrounded by green mana he will fly. If he is surrounded by red mana he will spit fire. But beware: The mana might move and it's difficult to foresee where it will go. Explore ten stages and fight a boss at the end of every stage. Don't stop, because the screen keeps moving. And watch out: If you get hit three times you loose.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 500 series
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game will only try to detect a controller when it is started.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 700 series
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
